alert.note: Alert for Allen; Evangeline; Rapides (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 09 at 7:54PM CST until December 09 at 8:30PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Rapides Parish in central Louisiana... Evangeline Parish in central Louisiana... Allen Parish in southwestern Louisiana... * Until 830 PM CST. * At 754 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles north of Oakdale to near Harmony, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Oakdale, Mamou, Oberlin, Elizabeth, Turkey Creek, Reeves, Mittie, Pine Prairie, Bayou Chicot, Harmony, Chicot State Park, Duralde, Allen Parish Airport, Leblanc, Beaver, Reddell, Bond, and St. Landry. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
